Subject: FW: U.S. v. Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Date: Thu, 29 Apr 2021 19:27:37 +0000 
Attachments: Letter re- Sleep Deprivation-4-29-2 I.pdf 
Hi all, 
Attached please find a letter just filed by Maxwell's counsel regarding sleep deprivation. She asks "the Court to address 
Ms. Maxwell's sleeping conditions by directing the MDC to cease 15-minute light surveillance of Ms. Maxwell or justify the 
need for the disruptive flashlight surveillance." Judge Nathan has not yet ordered any response but we wanted to send 
this along to you. Please let us know if a call would be useful. 
Thanks, 
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 2021 3:01 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Cc: Christian 
Everdell < 
Subject: U.S. v. Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Good afternoon-
Attached is a courtesy copy of today's ECF fling. 
Regards-
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
< 
>; 
>; 
Laura 
Menninger < 
; Jeff Pagliuca 
• •Covid-19 Notice: The West 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use email or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
EFTA00029134

Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
EFTA00029135
